articles.title: Pfizer, Moderna COVID booster shots for new strains gets approval from CDC panel, to be available in the US soon | Mint - Mint
articles.description: CDC approves release of COVID-19 booster shots in the US to protect against new strains, recommended for individuals aged six months and older.
articles.content: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) approved the release of COVID-19 booster shots ,on September 12, designed to provide protection against emerging strains of the virus. These booster s… [+3563 chars]
